question: 運動
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>carry</kanji> your <kanji>move</kanji>ments (or carry something along with your movements, like weights, for example) you are doing <vocabulary>exercise</vocabulary>. Speaking of which, perhaps you've been studying kanji a little too much lately. Time to get up and do some squats.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
